import React from 'react'; import {PricingQuote} from "../../components/cards/PricingCard" import { Slider, Select, SliderFilledTrack, SliderTrack, SliderThumb} from "@chakra-ui/react" import Fade from "react-reveal/Fade" const verifyNotEmpty = (x, text) => (x > 0 ? x + " " + text : ""); function StoragePricing(props) { const [tier, setTier] = React.useState(",Storage Tier One SSD Per TB"); const [type, setType] = React.useState(",Single Copy"); const [value, setValue] = React.useState(10); const handleChange = value => setValue(value); return (
Storage Options
Select Tier
Select Type
); } export default StoragePricing;
